Uses of Interface
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler.TransactionHandler

  • Packages that use TransactionHandler 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3
    POP3 (Post Office Protocol version 3) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3.handler
    Handler interfaces for the POP3 server.
